original_text:
Our mouths were filled with laughter,
    our tongues with songs of joy.
Then it was said among the nations,
    “The Lord has done great things for them.”
korean_text: 그 때에 우리 입에는 웃음이 가득하고 우리 혀에는 찬양이 찼었도다 그 때에 뭇 나라 가운데에서 말하기를 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 큰 일을 행하셨다 하였도다

sentences.original_text: Our mouths were filled with laughter
our tongues with songs of joy
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 혀는 기쁨의 노래로 가득 찼다

sentences.original_text: Then it was said among the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여러 민족들 사이에서 이렇게 말해졌다

sentences.original_text: "The Lord has done great things for them"
